import React, { useRef } from 'react' import {Form, Button, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext' //Add restrictions to the password like requiring a capital letter and longer than 6 characters export default function Signup() { const emailRef = useRef() const passwordRef = useRef() const passwordConfirmRef = useRef() const { signup } = useAuth() //remember, using destructuring to extract the signup function from AuthContext.js function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() signup(emailRef.current.value, passwordRef.current.value) } return ( <>
